doc.title: First Class Nudes: Vol. 2
doc.plot: First Class Nudes Vol.2 presents even more of Europe's most popular erotic stars, glamor-models and the hottest newcomers. Marketa Belonoha's career as a model began when she was 16 years old. The young Prague girl was covered by a lot of popular men's magazines such as Playboy, Perfect 10 and Maxim. Furthermore she was rated one of the sexiest women alive by the French editions of Playboy and Lui. Marketa is the highest paid nude model in Eastern Europe. On this DVD, you can experience the sexy blond and her girlfriends completely private and uncensored. Also featuring Angel Dark, Vanessa Cooper, Veronika Hanakova, and Zoe.
